intro: Psychotria pulverulenta, commonly known as the powdered psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, lowland tropical forests, thriving in shaded environments.
